00018 #ifndef CSWORDMODULEINFO_H
00019 #define CSWORDMODULEINFO_H
00020 
00021 //BibleTime includes
00022 #include "cswordbackend.h"
00023 #include "frontend/cpointers.h"
00024 
00025 
00026 //Qt includes
00027 #include <qstring.h>
00028 #include <qfont.h>
00029 #include <qmap.h>
00030 
00031 
00032 //Sword includes
00033 #include <listkey.h>
00034 #include <swversion.h>
00035 
00036 class SWModule;
00037 class CSwordBackend;
00038 class CHTMLEntryDisplay;
00039 
00048 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CPointers  {
00049 public:
00050   enum TextDirection { /* The text direction of the modules's text */
00051     LeftToRight,
00052     RightToLeft
00053   };
00054   enum ModuleType {
00055         Bible,
00056         Commentary,
00057         Lexicon,
00058         GenericBook,
00059         Unknown
00060     };
00065   enum UnlockErrorCode {
00066         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00067         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00068         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00069         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00070     };  
00071     enum ConfigEntry {
00072         AboutInformation, /* The about information of a module which is stored in the config file*/
00073         AbsoluteDataPath, /* The absolute data path stored in the config object */
00074         CipherKey, /* The cipher key which was used to unlock the module. Not necessarily set.*/
00075         DataPath, /* The relative path. See AbsoluteDataPath*/
00076         Description, /* The module decsription stored in the config file */
00077         ModuleVersion, /* The module's version.*/
00078         MinimumSwordVersion, /* The required Sword Version of this module. Otherwise some things may not work (compression etc.).*/
00079       TextDir,  
00080     DisplayLevel /* Mostly used for books. Gives the level which should contain the connected entries.*/
00081     };
00082     enum Feature {
00083         StrongsNumbers, /*Use for Bibles which have embedded strong numbers*/
00084         GreekDef, /*Hebrew StringsNumbers definitions in a lexicon*/
00085         HebrewDef,
00086         GreekParse,
00087         HebrewParse,
00088         DailyDevotion,
00089         Glossary
00090     };
00091     
00095     const QString config( const ConfigEntry );
00096     
00097     CSwordModuleInfo( SWModule* module );
00098     CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m );  
00099   virtual CSwordModuleInfo* clone();    
00100     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00101 
00105   SWModule* const module() const;
00110   const CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode unlock( const QString& unlockKey );
00118   CHTMLEntryDisplay* const getDisplay() const;
00124   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00129   const bool isLocked();
00130 
00134   const bool hasVersion() const;
00140   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00145   virtual ListKey& searchResult( const ListKey* newResult = 0 );
00149   virtual void interruptSearch();
00155   void clearSearchResult();
00159   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type() const;
00164   const SWVersion minimumSwordVersion();
00168   const QString name() const;
00172   const bool isUnicode();
00177   virtual const bool snap() {return false;};
00178   const bool has( const CSwordModuleInfo::Feature );
00179     const bool has( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option ) ;
00183   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::TextDirection textDirection();
00184 
00185 private:
00186     SWModule*   m_module;
00187     ListKey m_searchResult;
00188     struct {
00189         QString name;
00190         bool isUnicode;
00191     } m_dataCache;  
00192 };
00193 
00194 typedef QPtrList<CSwordModuleInfo>  ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00195 
00196 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType CSwordModuleInfo::type() const {
00197     return CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown;
00198 }
00199 
00200 inline SWModule*const CSwordModuleInfo::module() const {
00201     return m_module;
00202 }
00203 
00204 typedef QPtrList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00205 
00206 #endif
